image: Read the image. If this is food ingredient list, please summarize the ingredients. Provide recommendations on who should avoid this product and why.Reply with exactly two objects in a json: {summary, recommendation}.each should be a string.

Provide recommendations on who should avoid this product and why.Reply with exactly two objects in a json: {summary, recommendation}.each should be a string.
getting_ingredients: List the main ingredients for the food item '{food_item}' as a Python list. Reply with only the list, nothing else.
